name: AstroBlasto
description:
Hello and welcome to Astro Blasto a very relaxed and casual game meant to entertain you when you're bored. It is a simple Match -3 game meant to captivate the audience with simple and easy to learn gameplay and fun score gathering. (The game is best played on 1920 x 1080 format ) as UI may shift location depending on varying screen resolutions. Otherwise have fun and enjoy shooting asteroids in space to score lots of points. Challenge your friends to see who can score the highest or just try and beat the clock in our different modes. If you want to get together and work together try our multiplayer setting that lets you and a friend work together to rack up the highest score you can before time or your shots run out....
